Articles.Content:
Hi, it's me again.

Now I'm looking good mod for fairings. I have already tried NovaPunch and KW Rocketry, but they add too much additional cra... b to almost make it not worth it. Is there a mod that would just give the fairings and no fuel tanks nor engines.

inb4: "You can always delete the parts you don't want." I have already done that with KW. Maybe I'll do the same with NovaPunch also to see which is better. Which one do you prefer?
Procedural fairings is great. Last fairings mod you'll ever need.
